channel.title: davewiner tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from davewiner.

item.description: What if Twitter users banded together and bought $TWTR.
item.source:markdown: What if Twitter users banded together and bought $TWTR.

item.description: Malone is the largest private landowner in the United States, possessing upwards of 2.2 million acres (3,437 square miles), more than twice the size of Rhode Island. https://t.co/ZLGjclPu1y
item.source:markdown: Malone is the largest private landowner in the United States, possessing upwards of 2.2 million acres (3,437 square miles), more than twice the size of Rhode Island. https://t.co/ZLGjclPu1y

item.description: The fucker is using our twitter to give dog whistle orders to rioters on when they should hit the streets. https://t.co/Lky60SbYjE
item.source:markdown: The fucker is using our twitter to give dog whistle orders to rioters on when they should hit the streets. https://t.co/Lky60SbYjE

item.description: @bijan I love italy. ;-)
item.source:markdown: @bijan I love italy. ;-)

item.description:
1/4 People think so linear about the #Knicks. There are quite a few players out there with the potential of Donovan Mitchell to lead a team to dynasty.

2/4 Think of what the Knicks have to offer a potential trader. The Knicks bench is filled with potential like few others are. We've got a stockpile of draft picks. And the Knicks and the Garden and the talent are starting to get interesting to players. Like the way they want to

3/4 go to Duke or Kentucky. The Knicks are the un-Nets. The Knicks are building, not trying to buy a post-season powerhouse. ðŸ˜€

4/4 So sit tight, this is not the end of the dream of what those kids on the bench could become. They can become lots of things, not just Donovan Mitchell.
item.source:markdown:
1/4 People think so linear about the #Knicks. There are quite a few players out there with the potential of Donovan Mitchell to lead a team to dynasty.
2/4 Think of what the Knicks have to offer a potential trader. The Knicks bench is filled with potential like few others are. We've got a stockpile of draft picks. And the Knicks and the Garden and the talent are starting to get interesting to players. Like the way they want to
3/4 go to Duke or Kentucky. The Knicks are the un-Nets. The Knicks are building, not trying to buy a post-season powerhouse. ðŸ˜€
4/4 So sit tight, this is not the end of the dream of what those kids on the bench could become. They can become lots of things, not just Donovan Mitchell.

item.description:

item.source:markdown:

item.description:
@JoeTrippi You could say the same thing of the Democratic president. It really is all our responsibility to protect democracy. This is the problem everywhere in our country, the world. People are only aware of their own interest, not our shared interest.

@JoeTrippi You see it in tech when investors want to reap the reward of other people's work on open systems, and never want to make any contributions of their own.

@JoeTrippi BTW, I think the journalists are mostly on board with the idea that journalism has to fight on the side of freedom. It's the owners that are forcing them to change back.

A friend who was an early blogger sent me a link to a story about how blogging came about and no mention was made of how blogging actually came about. He thought I should give them hell.

It's the way it goes. All we are is dust in the wind. The journey is the reward. Live in the moment. Yadda yadda.

https://t.co/tTHoo1vpqb
item.source:markdown:
A friend who was an early blogger sent me a link to a story about how blogging came about and no mention was made of how blogging actually came about. He thought I should give them hell.
It's the way it goes. All we are is dust in the wind. The journey is the reward. Live in the moment. Yadda yadda.
https://t.co/tTHoo1vpqb

item.description: @Bajarin -- tim -- i saw you were quoted in an ad on the mets game last night. i didn't get a chance to see whose ad it was, but i thought --- hey i know that guy! :-)
item.source:markdown: @Bajarin -- tim -- i saw you were quoted in an ad on the mets game last night. i didn't get a chance to see whose ad it was, but i thought --- hey i know that guy! :-)

item.description:
We should all be fired up to vote Democratic thanks to the Dobbs decision and all the other rights the Supreme Court is poised to remove from all of us.

This is not just about women's rights, not even close.
item.source:markdown:
We should all be fired up to vote Democratic thanks to the Dobbs decision and all the other rights the Supreme Court is poised to remove from all of us.
This is not just about women's rights, not even close.

item.description: @AdamSinger @kanyewest it's even better. they hire idiots to play the role of creatives, raise money based on their acting ability and then come up with a clever excuse for why the investment tanked after the ipo, or don't even bother because the idiots they fleeced don't matter anyway.

item.description:
@dsearls We apologize for the inconvenience.

@dsearls Sorry we apologize for ANY inconvenience, we're not conceding that you were actually inconvenienced.

item.description: The insurrectionists of Jan 6 busted into the Capitol, hit police with fire extinguishers, flagpoles, bats and pepper spray; they threatened to kill the vice president and tried to overthrow the 2020 election. Now, they want an apology. https://t.co/Gars5bGQ4i

item.description: When Biden first used the "Maga Republican" term I was skeptical, but I've been hearing reporters and pundits using the term, so it's caught. It's a way for McConnell to say hey not all Repubs are fascists. I'm sure they did some kind of deal. https://t.co/CP9SuoNxXt
item.source:markdown: When Biden first used the "Maga Republican" term I was skeptical, but I've been hearing reporters and pundits using the term, so it's caught. It's a way for McConnell to say hey not all Repubs are fascists. I'm sure they did some kind of deal. https://t.co/CP9SuoNxXt

item.description: I love how Spotify calls their locked-up "podcast" platform "https://t.co/G4bfRixW8a" -- it's the way Machiavelli would do it. If you're closed, say you're open -- and let everyone debate whether you're scum or just an opportunist.
item.source:markdown: I love how Spotify calls their locked-up "podcast" platform "https://t.co/G4bfRixW8a" -- it's the way Machiavelli would do it. If you're closed, say you're open -- and let everyone debate whether you're scum or just an opportunist.
